question: Which state government has announced a new initiative ‘PEETHA’ to publicize govt schemes?
explanation: Odisha Chief Minister Naveen Patnaik  has recently announced a new initiative ‘PEETHA’ to create awareness about various government schemes and improve transparency. It also aims at improving transparency in the distribution of individual and social benefits. The acronym ‘PEETHA’ stands for   Peoples Empowerment Enabling Transparency and Accountability. The PEETHA is a sub-scheme of the state government\'s flagship Ama Gaon Ama Bikas yojana. As part of the initiative, camps will be organised at gram panchayat level from 15th to 20th of each month, beginning from December 2018. Every month the best panchayat in each Block will be given Rs 5 lakh for organising PEETHA. Upon completion of the camps, the best panchayats in each district will be awarded at the district Level.  Similarly, panchayats, blocks and best districts will be awarded with special funds at the state level.
